title: Mirijjawila Export Processing Zone gets new Admin Office
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana President Mahinda Rajapaksa declared open new Administration Office of the Sri Lanka Board of Investments (BOI) at the Mirijjawila Export Processing Zone in Hambantota. The new admin office will control all administrative and processing activities for exporting goods of the Mirijawila Export Processing Zone. It is…
